title: BOC user wants to update a UR Waiver Request after sending Waiver Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged 
AND a UR Waiver request has already been submitted 
AND the Request Bulletin corresponding to this UR Waiver Request has already been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Request Entry Screen
custom_expected:
THEN none of the following fields should be editable:
   Wishes to play in a foreign league checkbox (and corresponding Country dropdown)
   Comments
   Type and "As per release [date] [time]"

title: BOC user wants to save edits to the day's requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to the Waivers screen on the transactions dashboard
AND user is viewing the day's requests on the widget in Edit mode
AND Save button is available on the form 
BUT "Submit" button is NOT available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN the system will run a required field and formatting check, as well as all "On Submit" rules for any newly entered players
AND if a new request has been entered for an Org which did not previously have a submitted request, then the "Submitted By" and "Submitted On" fields for that request should be populated
BUT if that Org had at least one prior request for this bulletin then the Submitted information should not be updated
AND once all required fields and rules have passed, the form should reload in View mode, with "Request Entry" section collapsed and "Players with Requested Waivers" section expanded

title: User wants to submit a Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to the "Waivers" screen from the left nav
AND page is open in edit mode
AND "Submit to BOC" button is available

https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3788605/Waivers+-+Business+Rules
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" or "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND if any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user should receive an error message
AND system should refresh the page and sort the players alphabetically
AND system should check for any On Submit rules violations 
AND system should show successful waiver request submission notification and "Submitted On" and "Submitted By" fields are populated
AND these fields should be  updated if request submitted subsequent times
AND system should go back to view mode when complete

title: User wants to see any transaction on the player within the prior 30 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player that has a tx in his history during the last 30 days
custom_expected:
THEN tx and date should be displayed
AND only latest tx and only latest non-paperwork tx should be shown
BUT if no tx is found the label and field should not display

title: BOC User wants to delete a UR waiver request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
AND a UR waiver request has been submitted for a player
AND user has navigated to request entry section of waivers screen
AND trash can icon is visible on the request form for BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the trash can icon
custom_expected:
THEN a warning should fire notifying user that Deleting UR request cannot be undone
AND if user overrides error then UR request should be removed from the UI
AND if the user clicks save after removing the request the Release from Roster (URREL) tx should be reversed and suppressed
AND all appropriate On Reverse and On Suppress updates should be made
AND Transaction should be removed from Player History
AND Player's roster status should be returned to its previous value

title: User wants to receive error if they request waivers for player on Inactive List
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to submit waiver requests
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a player with one of the following roster statuses:
Military Leave
Disqualified
Restricted
Ineligible
Suspended
Bereavement/Family Medical
Paternity Leave
Voluntary Retired
AND clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the [Inactive List Type] list and must be reinstated before waivers may be requested.”
AND clicking back should return user to the form
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the workflow (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error/warning if player has Injured List status and request date is before reinstatement date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver request 
AND the player has a current or pending MJ DL status of:
• 7 Day Concussion IL
• Rehab 7 Day Concussion IL
• 10 Day IL
• Rehab 10 Day IL
• 60 Day IL
• Rehab 60 Day IL
AND request date on the form is before earliest reinstatement date from the player's most recent DL placement or transfer
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the IL, and has not yet served his minimum period of inactivity. He may have waivers requested on him starting [IL Reinstatement Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if injury checkbox is checked and one of two Injury Status buttons are not selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND Injury checkbox on the form is checked (checkbox only displays on OR requests outside of the MJ season dates)
BUT one of the two Injury Status buttons are not selected
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a blocker message (error message #32)
AND BOC should be able to override the blocker

title: User wants to receive error when submitting Waiver Request for a 10/5 player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND selected player is a 10/5 player  (Player Profile field "10/5 Player" is Yes) 
AND user has selected an Irrevocable, non-UR waiver type
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit on the Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is a 10/5 player, and may not have Irrevocable waivers requested for him.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the tx (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error when submitting request for player with Full or Limited No-Trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to submit a Waiver Request Entry for a player
AND selected player has a Full or Limited No-Trade Provision in their current MJC
AND user has selected OR Waiver type
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit to BOC or Save
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate error “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] has a no trade or limited no trade covenant in his contract, and may not have Irrevocable waivers requested for him.”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if player has non-UR type waivers requested during the DE Closed Period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND selected player is Rule 5 Draft Selected or Draft Excluded
AND player has OR type waivers requested
AND using year from the Player's profile (i.e. Draft Excluded YYYY), current date falls within DE Closed Period specified in the System Dates widget (Note that the date range spans calendar years)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] was either selected in the Rule 5 draft or has a Draft Excluded status and waivers may not be requested until [Eligible Date?].”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if "Player has recovered" checkbox has not been checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player that is on the Disabled List
AND request date is during the Major League season (based on MJ Season system dates)
AND request is NOT a UR waiver request
AND "Player has recovered" checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a blocker message (error message #31)
AND BOC should be able to override the error

title: User wants to receive error if it is after 2:00 PM ET on Request Date when request is submitted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND current time is after 2:00 PM ET on the Date of the Request
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request for [Last Name], [First Name]. New requests may not be submitted after 2:00 PM on the request date.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the request
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: Release from Roster tx automatically created for Unconditional Release Waiver Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND the request is a UR Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN user submits the UR Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN user should be alerted with message "The Release from Roster transaction for <Lastname, Firstname> has been changed to Approved state successfully"
AND Effective Date should be set from the "As Per Release on" date
AND Player's player history should be updated with: Code = URREL Description = Release from Roster, From Org/Club To Org/Club fields to be in black font, To Org/Club fields blank
AND automatically created "As per Release...." comment from waiver request should be saved in the tx
AND player's MJ Roster status should be set to "Released from Roster"
AND system should ensure that a 2nd transaction is not created if set of requests are submitted a 2nd time with UR included

title: User wants to receive warning if there are any players with Irrevocable Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND Waiver Request has Irrevocable Waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker error 	
“You have requested Irrevocable Waivers on the following players:
 
List of players with Irrevocable Waivers (Last, First)
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the request
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request

title: User wants to receive error if UR waivers are selected and Release Date is later than current Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user has selected UR waivers
AND Release Date is later than current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker error “Invalid Date entered for [Last Name], [First Name]’s Release, cannot be after the Current Date.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the form

title: User wants to receive error when submitting a player that has been signed as Free Agent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in and viewing Waivers Screen in edit mode
AND user has selected a Request Date that that is prior to June 16
AND user has selected a player that has been signed as a Free Agent under Article XXB in the prior offseason
AND user has selected Outright Waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message “Invalid Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is a recently signed XXB Free Agent.  The waiver cannot be requested for the selected player until [June 16, Current Year].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if OR waivers are selected and player already secured OR waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user has selected a player that has already secured outright waivers
AND "Outright Waivers Good Until" date on the Player's Profile is later than the Secure Date on the new Request (2 waiver business days after request date)
AND user has selected "OR" waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. You have already secured Outright Waivers for [Last Name], [First Name]. Secured waivers will be effective until [Waiver Expiration Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if player has unexpired Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to request entry section of Waivers screen
AND user has selected a player
AND selected player has an unexpired submitted
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" or "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] has an unexpired Trade or Optional Assignment waiver request.”
AND clicking "Back" should return user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with waiver request submission (BOC Only)

title: User wants to be able to enter additional fields for a player who wishes to play in foreign league when UR waivers is selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND UR waiver type is selected for player in a New Request Entry Form
custom_steps: WHEN UR waiver type is selected for player in a New Request Entry Form
custom_expected:
THEN "As per release on" field should be displayed with a date picker and time picker
AND "Wishes to play in a foreign league" checkbox should display
AND when “Wishes to play in a foreign league” is checked, a dropdown should appear with a list of available countries that include Japan, Mexico and South Korea
AND a “Cash Consideration Amount” field should be displayed that allows entry of a dollar amount

title: User wants to be unable to select a player if player already has a pending waiver request for the selected date (cannot select a player twice)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND selected player already has a pending request
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks "Add Player"
AND opens "Player" Dropdown
custom_expected: THEN player should not be listed in the dropdown

title: User wants to designate that player on Injured List has recovered
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user wants to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps:
WHEN Request Date is during the season
AND the player is on the Injured List (This includes both Major League IL and Optioned players on the Minor Lg IL. this includes players on rehab as well)
custom_expected: THEN the user should see “Player has recovered from ailment and is capable of playing at his accustomed level.” checkbox

title: User wants to know if player already had waiver request withdrawn during current waiver period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to the request entry section of Waivers screen
AND user has selected a player that has already had a waiver request withdrawn during the current waiver period for the same Org
custom_steps: WHEN user chooses TRD or OPT as Waiver Type
custom_expected: THEN "Irrevocable" should be displayed in orange, next to the "Type" label

title: User does not want to see seconds in time field for UR Waiver Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC user
AND user has navigated to Waivers Screen
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player and chooses "UR" type waivers
custom_expected:
THEN seconds should not be available in the "As Per Release AT" field timepicker
AND seconds should not display in this field in view or edit mode

title: BOC User wants to view an existing Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to view "Waivers" tab
AND "Waivers" is an option on the left nav
custom_steps: WHEN user views the "Request Entry" section
custom_expected:
THEN for each request, system should display Player Name, Position, MLS, IL (Y/N), DE/SEL (Y/N), Waiver Type, Latest Transaction and date (if one exists in last 30 days), Injury Discrepancy (checkbox) Comments and, for BOC, Request Date, Org and Submitted On date, and Submitted By (username)
AND the layout of the tx should match View mode of provided wireframe
AND fields should match data discovery

title: Club User wants to view an existing Waiver Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user is attempting to view the "Request Entry" section
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to the "Request Entry" section
custom_expected:
THEN "Waiver Date" should be defaulted to today's date if before 2:00PM
BUT "Waiver Date" should be defaulted to next Waiver Date (next business day) if after 2:00PM (when the MLBPA Waiver Request Batch is run)
AND if tx is occurring during the Weekend Waiver period as specified in System Dates widget, weekends should be included as business days
AND any requests for the default date and the user's Org should be shown
AND system should display Player Name, Position, MLS, IL (Y/N), DE/SEL (Y/N), Waiver Type, Latest Transaction and date (if one exists in last 30 days), Injury Discrepancy (checkbox), Comments and, for BOC,  Request Date, Org and Submitted On date, and Submitted By (username)
AND layout and fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to select a date for a Waiver Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to date picker field on Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN date picker should default to today's date until 2:00 PM
BUT after 2:00 PM date picker should default to tomorrow's date
AND system should load appropriate requests for the default date shown and user's Org for club user and selected Org for BOC user
AND system should allow any historical date entry
BUT system should  prevent user from selecting date beyond the default date
AND if different date is selected appropriate requests for that date and Org should be loaded

title: User wants to see an "Injured" checkbox if Waiver Request is made in the off season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND request date is not between the MJ league "First Day of Season" and "Last Day of Season" system dates
AND the request is NOT a UR waiver request
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player
custom_expected: THEN an "Injured" checkbox should be displayed

title: BOC User wants to edit comments in Waiver Request Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user wants to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user navigates to Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN BOC user should always see Comments field
AND BOC user should be able to enter/edit comments in the Comments field

title: Club User does not want to edit comments in Waiver Request Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user wants to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN club user should only see comments field if populated 
AND user should not be able to edit comments

title: User wants to see weekend waiver periods on system dates screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club or BOC user
AND user has permissions to edit System Dates screen
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to System Dates Screen
custom_expected:
THEN "Allow Weekend Waiver Requests" should be an available field
AND user should be able to enter or pick a start date and end date

title: User wants to cancel any edits to Request Entry
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club or BOC user
AND user has navigated to the Waiver Request Entry screen
AND and user is attempting to edit a Waiver Request
AND "Cancel" button is available on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel" while editing the request
custom_expected:
THEN system should display message  "Are you sure you want to Cancel? You will lose any unsaved changes."
AND "Yes" and "No" options should be available 
AND clicking 'Yes' should remove any changes since the last "submit" and reload the form in view mode, maintaining the selected org and date
AND clicking 'No' should close the modal and allow the user to continue working.

title: User wants to see comments if selected player is a 10/5 player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request Entry
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a 10/5 player (greater than 10 years total MLS with at least the last 5 years at the same club - found in Service section of the Player Profile)
custom_expected: THEN the text "10/5 Player" should be appended to the Comments

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - BOC - Admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with BOC admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN BOC admin user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to view, create, delete, edit, and submit waiver requests for players

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - BOC - Basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with BOC basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN BOC basic user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all waiver requests 
BUT user should NOT be able to make any changes

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - Club - Admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Club Admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to view, create, delete, submit, and edit all waiver requests for their own players (It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the request)

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - Club - Basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Club Basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be able to view all waiver requests for their own players (It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the request)
BUT user should not be able to make any changes

title: BOC user wants to send a Request Bulletin
User wants to see the most up to date "latest transaction"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to create a Waiver Request Entry
custom_steps: WHEN user loads a pending waiver request bulletin (not yet sent)
custom_expected:
THEN system should check for and display the players' latest Approved transaction, even if none was previously displayed or it differs from what was displayed when request was submitted
AND if a user has manually entered a latest transaction for the player, that should NOT be overwritten by any transaction information found by the system. The user's entry should remain
AND refreshing the page should load the latest transactions for the player(s) being viewed
AND when BOC hits "Send Request Bulletin" system should NOT check for the latest transactions, and should capture whatever current entry is and store it along with bulletin information
AND once Bulletin has been sent, system should no longer look for or update any of the list players' Latest Transaction information, but should display whatever value was stored there at the time of the bulletin being sent for the first time (to account for subsequent re-sends of the same bulletin)

title: User wants to receive notification when a request bulletin is sent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC or Club user 
AND user has navigated to the Waivers screen on Transactions dashboard
AND one or more players are found in the "Players with Submitted Requests" table
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a Notification for users with the roles "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-VIEWERS", "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-EDITORS", or "EBIS-WV-BULLETIN-SENDERS"
AND notification Date should be equal to the current date, with the To and From Org columns blank
AND description text should read "Waiver request bulletin for [request date] is available."

title: BOC user wants to resend notifications for a Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to the waivers screen on transactions dashboard
AND user is viewing a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
AND "Resend Notification Emails" button has appeared on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Resend Notification Emails" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should open a pop-up where the user will be able to select the type of notification emails to resend, and the Org(s) it should be resent to
AND "All BOC" should be checked by default
AND "All Clubs" should be selected by default
AND Selecting "Select Clubs" should result in a Club dropdown appearing
AND When "Select Clubs" is actively selected, the "Club" dropdown should be a multi-select dropdown with all 30 Orgs' abbreviations available
AND if the user re-selects "All Clubs" the Club dropdown should be hidden again, and any previous selections made should be ignored
AND the "Bulletin" field should be a dropdown with the options "Request" and "Results" (but for now the only option is "Request")
AND clicking "Cancel" should close the pop-up and send nothing
AND clicking "Resend" should NOT store any changes made to the form or update the stored bulletin, but should generate a new set of notifications for the selected recipients

title: Club user wants to see Players with Requested Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club user
AND user has navigated to the waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has been sent
custom_expected:
THEN a "All Players with Requested Waivers Expiring <selected request date>" collapsible section should be displayed and expanded by default
AND this section should only display players requested in sent Request Bulletins (OR -2 days, UR -1 day) 
AND "All Players with Requested Waivers Expiring <selected waiver date>" section should match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND "All Players with Requested Waivers Expiring <selected waiver date>" section should contain all of the players for whom waivers were requested by all Orgs that are expiring on the currently selected waiver date
AND the table should be sorted by Org and then by the player's name (Last, First)
AND the "Request Entry" section should be expanded by default 
AND "Request Entry" should display the players that the Club has requested waivers on for the "Waiver Date" being viewed
AND if no players are found in the Request Entry section, there should be a line of text stating "There are no waiver requests for the selected date and org."

title: Club user wants to submit a Waiver Claim
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Waiver claim
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Players with Requested Waivers" section of Waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN A "Claim" button should be displayed for each player submitted by another Org
BUT no claim  button should display for players from the user's Org
AND no claim button should appear for any club user if after 1:00PM ET on the Claim Expiration Date
AND clicking "Claim" should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to claim waivers on the selected player
AND if user clicks “OK” the system should submit the claim for the club and in place of "claim" button, system should display date and time for which claim was made
BUT if user clicks “Cancel” claim should not be made on player and user should be taken back to claim entry screen
AND once a Waiver Claim has successfully been submitted for a player, the claim information should appear in the "Results" table for the BOC as "Claimed by ORG mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm am/pm"

title: BOC User wants to submit a Waiver Claim on behalf of a club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Claim on behalf of a club
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "Players with Requested Waivers" section of Waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN a Claim button should be displayed for all players
AND clicking the Claim button should launch a pop-over that allows the user to select a single Org
AND the player's Org should not appear in the dropdown, nor should any other Orgs that have already submitted a waiver claim for the player
AND clicking “Cancel” should close the popover and take no action
AND selecting an Org and clicking "Claim" should  prompt the user to confirm the claim
AND once user has confirmed they wish to proceed with the claim, modal and popover should be dismissed and user should be returned to "Players with Submitted Requests" table
AND the Claim button should remain for the player
AND if BOC user were to expand the "Claims/Results Expiring" section of the date that the claims expire, they would see "Claimed by ORG date/time" information just as though a Club had performed the Claim
AND if BOC user has entered a Claim on behalf of a club and it is after 1:00PM on the Claim Expiration Date, result should show Claim Expiration Date as mm/dd/yyyy in the result and 12:59 pm as the time in the result

title: User wants to receive error if submitting a Waiver Claim past 1PM EST on Waiver Claim Expiration Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Claim
AND current time is past 1PM EST on the Claim Expiration Date of the current Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN user confirms that they wish to proceed with the claim
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "The claiming period for [Last Name], [First Name]'s waiver request expired at 1:00 PM on [Claiming Period Expiration Date]”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the workflow (BOC Only)

title: User wants to view notification on clipboard when club has submitted waiver claim entry
custom_preconds: GIVEN a waiver request exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN club submits a waiver claim entry on the player
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a notification for BOC users in the roles "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-VIEWERS", "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-EDITORS", or "EBIS-WV-BULLETIN-SENDERS"
AND notification text should be in this format: "Waiver Request for [request date] – [claiming org] has placed a claim on this player"
AND the notification Date should be equal to the current date, with the Player name populated and a hyperlink to the player's history
AND description should be a link to the waivers screen for the relevant Request Date

title: BOC user wants to view submitted Waiver Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user

- "UR Claim Expiration Date cannot be equal to or before the Request Date."

title: BOC User wants to view a properly formatted waiver result including Eligible Org after a waiver claim

AND a Waiver Claim has been processed
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Results" section of waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN if only one claim has been entered, it should appear as "Claimed by *ARI 6/10/2016 12:59 " showing Date and time of claim and claiming Org
AND if more than one Org has entered a claim for a player, this should appear as "Claimed by *ARI 6/10/2016 12:59 BAL 6/10/2016 12:59"
AND an asterisk (*) should be used to denote the Org actually eligible to make the claim
AND after eligible Org, following claim Orgs should be displayed in alphabetical order

title: BOC User wants system to determine which Org is eligible when a waiver request has more than one claim entered for it - Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC or Club user
AND a Trade Waiver Request has been entered for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the Trade Waiver Request has more than one claim entered for it
custom_expected:
THEN system should check if any of the claiming Orgs are in the same League as Org that entered the Request
AND if there is only one claiming Org in the same League, then that Org should be designated as the Eligible Org
BUT if more than one claiming Org is in the same League, the Orgs NOT in the same League should automatically not be eligible
AND if no Orgs are in the same League as the Org that entered the Request, or if more than one claiming Org is in the same League, then the Eligible Org should be decided based on the lowest winning percentage of the remaining Eligible Orgs
AND if the Claim Expiration Date is within the first 31 days of the season (First Day of MJ Season system date + 30 days), then the Org with the lowest winning percentage from the prior season should be considered the Eligible Org
BUT if the Claim Expiration Date is NOT within the first 31 days of the season, then the Org with the lowest winning percentage from the current season should be considered the Eligible Org
AND if there is more than one Org that has the lowest percentage, then the system should look to the prior season, and so on until the tie is broken

title: BOC User wants system to determine which Org is eligible when a waiver request has more than one claim entered for it - Non-Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC or Club user
AND a Non-Trade (OR, UR) Waiver Request has been entered for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the Trade Waiver Request has more than one claim entered for it
custom_expected:
THEN if the Claim Expiration Date is within the first 31 days of the season, then the Org with the lowest winning percentage from the prior season should be considered the Eligible Org
BUT if the Claim Expiration Date is NOT within the first 31 days of the season, then the Org with the lowest winning percentage from the current season should be considered the Eligible Org
AND if there is more than one Org that has the lowest percentage, then the system should look to the prior season, and so on until the tie is broken

title: BOC user wants to resend notifications for Result Bulletin
custom_preconds:

custom_expected:

AND "All Clubs" should be selected by default
AND selecting "Select Clubs" should result in a Club dropdown appearing
AND when "Select Clubs" is actively selected, the "Club" dropdown should be a multi-select dropdown with all 30 Orgs' abbreviations available
AND if the user re-selects "All Clubs" the Club dropdown should be hidden again, and any previous selections made should be ignored

title: User wants sending Waiver Results Bulletin to properly set results for players who have secured waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Waivers have been requested for a player
BUT these requested waivers do not yet have a result
AND these requested waivers have NOT been claimed or cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN Waiver Result Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN results should be set according to the following criteria:


For UR waivers, set result text to "Secured for the purposes of UR".

For all other waivers, set result text to "Secured until {Waiver Claim Expiration Date}"

Waiver Claim Expiration Date should be formatted as “Secured until [Sun] [Jan] [10], [13]:00 ET [2014]”, except for in the case of "Midnight", which should be spelled out in place of the time (Ex: Secured until [Sun] [Jan] [10], Midnight ET [2014].)

The Waiver Claim Expiration Date is determined by the following steps:

Determine the waiver period end date based on waiver type

Default waiver expiration date to 5pm on waiver period end

Handle special cases:

if player is optioned, update waiver expiration date to 1pm on the 3rd calendar day after the claim expiration date, unless that falls after the end of the waiver period

Else for outright waivers where the claim expiration date was in the 1st, outright waiver period, update waiver expiration date to 1pm on the 7th calendar day after the claim expiration date, unless that falls after the end of the waiver period.
 

For outright waivers with a claim expiration date in the 3rd outright waiver period, if the player is not Optioned, set the time in the result message to Midnight instead of whatever time was determined above

(NOTE: prior to 2019 there were 5 waiver periods, criteria above should be in effect from 2019 onward)

title: Updates to Results Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Results Bulletin has generated with one or more requests and claims entered
custom_steps: WHEN Club user receives Result Bulletin Email notification
custom_expected:
CLUB USER
At the top of the Results notification, the club user should see:
"MLB - Waiver Result Bulletin"
"<Name of ORG>"

Below the header, the Club user will see the Results of the requests that expired that day, meaning the OR requests from 2 days prior, and the UR requests from 1 day prior.  The format will be:
• “Results of Outright requests from bulletin on <Result Date – 2 days> which expired on <OR Results Date>”
• “Results of Unconditional Release requests from bulletin on <Result Date -1 day>”
o The dates will be in the following format:  DAY(Abbrev) MM/DD/YYYY
o The players will then be displayed, sorted by Waiver Type, Last Name, First Name
   If the Org’s players were claimed by another org, that Claim will be listed
   If the Org’s player was unclaimed on a UR waiver, he will be listed as “Secured for the purposes of UR
   If the Org’s player was unclaimed on an OR waiver, the Secured Until date will display.

The next section should have the results of the Org’s claims that expired that day, meaning the OR requests from 2 days prior, and the UR requests from 1 day prior.  The format will be:
• “Results of your claims on Outright requests from bulletin on <Result Date – 2 days> which expired on <OR Results Date>”
• “Results of your claims on Unconditional Release requests from bulletin on <Result Date -1 day>”
o The dates will be in the following format:  DAY(Abbrev) MM/DD/YYYY
o The players will then be displayed, sorted by Waiver Type, Last Name, First Name

BOC USER
At the top of the Results notification, a BOC user should see:
• MLB - Waiver Result Bulletin
• “BOC Version (All Clubs)” if BOC

Below the header, the BOC user will see the Results of the requests that expired that day, meaning the OR requests from 2 days prior, and the UR requests from 1 day prior.  The format will be:
• “Results of Outright requests from bulletin on <Result Date – 2 days> which expired on <OR Results Date>”
• “Results of Unconditional Release requests from bulletin on <Result Date -1 day>”
o The dates will be in the following format:  DAY(Abbrev) MM/DD/YYYY
o The players will be displayed, sorted by Last Name, First Name
    In addition, the notification will display the player’s ORG, waiver type, Waiver Type, and the result of the waiver (secured by, secured until, claimed, cancelled, etc)

title: Updates to the Request Bulletin

AND "Comments:" should appear, along with the comments entered for the Waiver Request for those requests that have comments associated. 
BUT if a request does not have a comment entered, the label should not appear

title: As a user I want to be able to print a Notice of Disposition for players on a Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Waivers print permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to a Waiver Claim Assignment tx for a player
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a "Print" button on the Considerations section for each player that has been added to a waiver claim assignment 
AND clicking the Print button for the original player should print the NOD for a waiver claim assignment
AND clicking the Print button for any players added to the WCA should print the NOD for an Outright Trade

title: As a user I want to be able to print an Assignment Agreement for a Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Waivers print permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to a Waiver Claim Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a "Print" button at the bottom of a Waiver Claim Assignment. 
AND clicking this should allow the user to choose to print an Assignment Agreement
AND selecting Assignment Agreement should print the assignment agreement for the waiver claim assignment

title: User wants to view existing Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to advanced search for waivers
AND user has navigated to Advanced Search screen
AND "Waiver Claim Assignment" is an option in Transactions Advanced Search in the "Transaction Type"
custom_steps: WHEN user conducts  an advanced search for "Waiver Claim Assignment"
custom_expected:
THEN system should properly return the results from ebis1
AND clicking on the date should open the associated waiver claim assignment
AND form should match the provided wireframe and data discoveries
AND same behavior should be present in the associated players' player histories

title: WCA automatically created for OR waivers upon sending results bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN OR waivers have been requested for one or more players
AND these waivers have been claimed
custom_steps: WHEN Results bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN a waiver claim assignment should be created and submitted to BOC for these players
AND for all waivers with or without Rule 5 DE/SEL, the Waiver Claim Assignment should have a Cash Consideration of $50,000
AND clubs should not be able to manipulate the terms at all in the Submitted to BOC state

title: User wants to create Waiver Claim Assignment - Player Accept
custom_preconds:
GIVEN waivers have been requested for a player
AND relevant request bulletin has been sent
AND waivers have been claimed by one or more orgs
AND relevant results bulletin has been sent
AND user has navigated to the player table in Claims/results section on waivers screen
AND "Player Accept" is available in a split button next to this player's name
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Player Accept"
custom_expected:
THEN system should create a preliminary waiver claim assignment for the selected player and redirect the user to the transaction
AND Waiver Claim Assignment should have the creating Org's consideration be for the player, and the claiming Org's Cash Consideration = $1
AND  player the waivers were requested for should NOT be able to be removed from the transaction
AND if a preliminary waiver claim assignment already exists for the selected player, the system should redirect the user to the existing waiver claim assignment instead of creating a new one
AND the WCA should follow the stateflow of a Trade
AND neither club should be able to add or remove any considerations

title: User wants to receive error if Waiver Claim Assignment does not meet required criteria
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player has been claimed on OR waivers
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Claim Assignment for this player
custom_steps: WHEN user submits Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_expected:
THEN system should check that cash Considerations contain at least $50K (not conditional) or a second player (could be P2BNL).
BUT this rule should not apply to UR waivers who are R5 Draft Excluded or Selected.
AND if this rule is violated, system should display Error Message #47.

title: BOC user wants to approve Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in 
AND a Waiver Claim Assignment has been submitted for a player
AND BOC user has navigated to the submitted Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all On Approve rule checks that would run on an outright trade
AND once all rule checks pass, the Waiver Claim Assignment should be marked as "Approved"
AND system should Follow all On Approve rules listed for Outright Trades, including:
- Daily Transaction Bulletin entry
- Player History entry
- Auto-Creation of a Recall where applicable
- Roster Status, Club and Player Info updates.
- Clearing of the Approvals item for the BOC and generation of a notification for the involved Clubs

title: Recalculate CBT impact on approval of Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Waiver Claim Assignment has been submitted for a Player
custom_steps: WHEN the Waiver Claim Assignment reaches a status of Approved
custom_expected: THEN system should recalculate the CBT impact of the player

title: User wants to create Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC
AND user has navigated to waivers screen
AND user has selected a request date for which results bulletin has been sent
AND user is viewing claims/results section
AND "Create Waiver Claim" button is available for one or more players
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create Waiver Claim"
custom_expected:
THEN system should create a preliminary waiver claim assignment for the selected player and redirect the user to the transaction
AND Waiver Claim Assignment should have the creating Org's consideration be for the player
AND claiming Org's Cash Consideration should = $50,000 for all Waiver types except UR
AND the player the waivers were requested for should NOT be able to be removed from the transaction
AND if a preliminary waiver claim assignment already exists for the selected player, the system should redirect the user to the existing waiver claim assignment instead of creating a new one
AND clubs should not be able to manipulate the terms at all in the Submitted to BOC state
BUT clubs can only add/remove them for WCAs off of claimed TRD waivers

title: User wants to receive a notification if any UR Waiver Requests have not yet been accepted or rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a claimed UR waiver request exists for a player that still has not been player accepted or player rejected
AND a user is logged in as BOC Waiver Admin or player's Club's Waiver Admin user
custom_steps: WHEN the nightly notification batch runs
custom_expected:
THEN system should check to see if any UR Waiver Requests that have been claimed still have not been player accepted or player rejected. 
AND if a waiver request is found that meets the above criteria, then the following notification should be generated for the BOC Waiver Admin as well as the player's Club's Waiver Admin user:       " Unconditional Release Waiver Claim Reminder.  [player name], has until [date] to accept or reject the assignment from [club]."

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to Approve/Reject a Waiver Claim Assignment from the Approvals Clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in 
AND user has navigated to Approvals Clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN user checks the checkbox for a submitted Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_expected:
THEN system should enable the Approve and Reject buttons on the Approvals widget
AND clicking Approve or Reject should run the requisite rules and perform the regular On Approve or On Reject updates

title: As a user I want to be able to print a Trade Checklist from a Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with print permissions for Waiver Claim Assignments
AND a Waiver Claim Assignment exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the WCA in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a Print button at the bottom of the form
AND clicking on the button should allow the user to choose to print a Trade Checklist
AND printing the Trade Checklist should generate a trade checklist for the WCA just like for an outright trade

title: As a user I want a Return from Rehab to be created when a Waiver Claim Assignment is approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Waiver Claim Assignment is approved, if the player has a MJ or MN Roster status of "Rehab"
custom_steps: WHEN the system will automatically create a "Return from Rehab" transaction for the player.
custom_expected:
THEN If the player is on the MJ League DL, then a MJ League Return from Rehab should be created.
IF the player is on the MN League DL, then a MN League Return from Rehab should be created. 
AND The Return date will = the waiver claim assignment date. 
AND The Return from Rehab will automatically be submitted and approved for the player. Any rules violations will be overridden. 
AND Once the Return from Rehab has been approved, the system will create a Reinstate from DL for the player as laid out in #132788303. 
AND This should only happen once the Waiver Claim Assignment rules have all passed.

title: As a user I want a Reinstate from Injured List to be created when a Waiver Claim Assignment is approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN  a Waiver Claim Assignment is approved, if the Request Date falls in the MJ League Season and the player has a MJ or MN Roster status of "Injured List"
custom_steps: WHEN the system will automatically create a "Reinstate from Injured List" transaction for the player.
custom_expected:
THEN If the player is on the MJ League IL, then a MJ League Reinstate from IL should be created.
IF the player is on the MN League IL, then a MN League Reinstate from IL should be created. 
AND The Reinstatement date will = the waiver claim assignment date. 
AND The Reinstate from DL will automatically be submitted and approved for the player. 
AND This should only happen once the Waiver Claim Assignment rules have all passed.
